adverb.description: By that means; as a result of that.
examples: students perform in hospitals, thereby gaining a deeper awareness of the therapeutic power of music

phrases: Venus has no satellites, and thereby hangs a tale.
It is finally being published in the magazine's current edition, more than a century late, and thereby hangs a tale.
For some reason (and thereby hangs a tale), I decided to write the application in Brazillian Portuguese.
